title: Premium Listing for Maximum Visibility
description: Highlight your listing with a premium placement and reach significantly more interested parties. Premium listings appear at the top of search results, attract more attention, and offer enhanced presentation features.

features.title: Top Placement
features.text: Your listing appears at the top of search results

features.title: Highlighted Design
features.text: Special colors and frames make your ad stand out immediately

features.title: Performance Reports
features.text: Track how well your listing is performing

tipText: Combine the premium listing with targeted banner ads to further increase your visibility.
